biotools.summary:
It includes adresses the problem of protein list comparison, which can be challenging due to different or changing database accession numbers.
In addition to a simple accession based comparison, ProLiC permits a more reliable comparison of an arbitrary number of protein lists by considering measured sequence and/or peptide information.

bioschemas.name: ProLiC (Protein List Comparator)
bioschemas.summary:
It includes adresses the problem of protein list comparison, which can be challenging due to different or changing database accession numbers.
In addition to a simple accession based comparison, ProLiC permits a more reliable comparison of an arbitrary number of protein lists by considering measured sequence and/or peptide information.
